item.title: N States
item.description: The Premise We’ve come a long way since we wrote the first line of software. The premise of building software has always been simple; automate or solve a problem. From creating straight forward inventory software that ran locally on machines to cloud infrastructure, there’s one thing that has always remained constant while building software. States. A rudimentary definition of what a state is can be understood as the value of variables at any given point in time that is stored in the memory.
